text: HomeCareersAs Margaux's Social Media Manager, you will help bring the digital voice of our brand to life, responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that showcase our shoes, tell our story, and foster a community of Margaux loyalists.About MargauxMargaux is an authentic expression of the style and spirit of everyone who wears them. Sarah Pierson and Alexa Buckley launched Margaux in 2015 with the mission of creating beautiful shoes that meet the demands of everyday life. Margaux shoes are thoughtfully designed, versatile, and comfortable—made, in other words, for a woman too busy for the shoe shuffle. Designed in New York City, and crafted in Spain, Margaux also offers inclusive sizing with its vast range (from EU 33 to 45) and option to choose from three widths (narrow, medium, or wide).About the RoleAs Margaux's Social Media Manager, you will help bring the digital voice of our brand to life, responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that showcase our shoes, tell our story, and foster a community of Margaux loyalists. This role requires a blend of creativity, strategic thinking, and a passion for both fashion and social media trends. This position offers a unique opportunity to join Margaux at an exciting stage of growth. The ideal candidate will be passionate about shoes, digital storytelling, and creating meaningful connections with our community of customers.Key Responsibilities● Design and implement a comprehensive social media strategy that drives brand awareness, engagement, and reinforces Margaux's commitment to fit, quality, and timeless style.● Create engaging photo and video content featuring Margaux shoes for all social channels, including styling tips, behind-the-scenes glimpses, and customer stories.● Manage all Margaux social media channels (with a focus on Instagram and TikTok), growing our follower base and engagement rates.● Support influencer partnerships that align with Margaux's brand values, focusing on authentic storytelling and showcasing the versatility of our shoes.● Plan and execute the weekly social calendar, supporting new shoe launches, collaborations, and promotions.● Manage and maintain Margaux’s blog as a standalone destination.● Create and maintain onsite Press hub, highlighting press hits with relevant quotes and amplifying as content across other mediums as relevant (blog posts, social posts, etc).● Coordinate with our Customer Experience team to manage social interactions (DMs, comments, etc), ensuring prompt and on-brand responses to comments and messages.● Analyze and report on social media performance, adjusting strategies to optimize engagement and conversions.● Stay up-to-date on footwear trends, sustainable fashion practices, and social media innovations to keep Margaux at the forefront of the industry.● Provide on-site social coverage at Margaux events, pop-ups, and relevant fashion weeks.● Collaborate with the product team to share back customer feedback and insights for future shoe designs and collections.Qualifications● 5+ years of experience in social media management, preferably in the fashion or accessories industry.● Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Fashion Communications, or a relevant field.● In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, with a strong understanding of what performs well on each.● Experience with photo and video editing tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, Final Cut Pro).● Strong skills in mobile photography and videography for creating authentic, in-the-moment content.● Excellent copywriting skills with the ability to capture Margaux's brand voice - sophisticated yet approachable.● Analytical mindset with proficiency in social media analytics tools and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.● A keen eye for aesthetics and visuals, particularly in showcasing footwear.● Passion for Margaux's mission and a deep understanding of our target customer.● Self-motivated with a proactive approach to problem-solving and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.What Margaux Offers● An opportunity to shape the digital presence of a rapidly growing, innovative shoe brand.● A collaborative, creative work environment in our New York City office, with flexible work-from-home options.● Fabulous employee discount.● Competitive salary package, health benefits, 401(k), and unlimited paid time off.● Professional development opportunities and the chance to grow with the brand.● A team passionate about democratizing comfort + style for shoes and empowering women through great design.To Apply: Please visit html:
• Home
  • Careers

As Margaux's Social Media Manager, you will help bring the digital voice of our brand to life, responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that showcase our shoes, tell our story, and foster a community of Margaux loyalists.

About Margaux
Margaux is an authentic expression of the style and spirit of everyone who wears them. Sarah Pierson and Alexa Buckley launched Margaux in 2015 with the mission of creating beautiful shoes that meet the demands of everyday life. Margaux shoes are thoughtfully designed, versatile, and comfortable—made, in other words, for a woman too busy for the shoe shuffle. Designed in New York City, and crafted in Spain, Margaux also offers inclusive sizing with its vast range (from EU 33 to 45) and option to choose from three widths (narrow, medium, or wide).

About the Role
As Margaux's Social Media Manager, you will help bring the digital voice of our brand to life, responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that showcase our shoes, tell our story, and foster a community of Margaux loyalists. This role requires a blend of creativity, strategic thinking, and a passion for both fashion and social media trends. This position offers a unique opportunity to join Margaux at an exciting stage of growth. The ideal candidate will be passionate about shoes, digital storytelling, and creating meaningful connections with our community of customers.

Key Responsibilities
● Design and implement a comprehensive social media strategy that drives brand awareness, engagement, and reinforces Margaux's commitment to fit, quality, and timeless style.
● Create engaging photo and video content featuring Margaux shoes for all social channels, including styling tips, behind-the-scenes glimpses, and customer stories.
● Manage all Margaux social media channels (with a focus on Instagram and TikTok), growing our follower base and engagement rates.
● Support influencer partnerships that align with Margaux's brand values, focusing on authentic storytelling and showcasing the versatility of our shoes.
● Plan and execute the weekly social calendar, supporting new shoe launches, collaborations, and promotions.
● Manage and maintain Margaux’s blog as a standalone destination.
● Create and maintain onsite Press hub, highlighting press hits with relevant quotes and amplifying as content across other mediums as relevant (blog posts, social posts, etc).
● Coordinate with our Customer Experience team to manage social interactions (DMs, comments, etc), ensuring prompt and on-brand responses to comments and messages.
● Analyze and report on social media performance, adjusting strategies to optimize engagement and conversions.
● Stay up-to-date on footwear trends, sustainable fashion practices, and social media innovations to keep Margaux at the forefront of the industry.
● Provide on-site social coverage at Margaux events, pop-ups, and relevant fashion weeks.
● Collaborate with the product team to share back customer feedback and insights for future shoe designs and collections.

Qualifications
● 5+ years of experience in social media management, preferably in the fashion or accessories industry.
● Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Fashion Communications, or a relevant field.
● In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, with a strong understanding of what performs well on each.
● Experience with photo and video editing tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, Final Cut Pro).
● Strong skills in mobile photography and videography for creating authentic, in-the-moment content.
● Excellent copywriting skills with the ability to capture Margaux's brand voice - sophisticated yet approachable.
● Analytical mindset with proficiency in social media analytics tools and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.
● A keen eye for aesthetics and visuals, particularly in showcasing footwear.
● Passion for Margaux's mission and a deep understanding of our target customer.
● Self-motivated with a proactive approach to problem-solving and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.

What Margaux Offers
● An opportunity to shape the digital presence of a rapidly growing, innovative shoe brand.
● A collaborative, creative work environment in our New York City office, with flexible work-from-home options.
● Fabulous employee discount.
● Competitive salary package, health benefits, 401(k), and unlimited paid time off.
● Professional development opportunities and the chance to grow with the brand.
● A team passionate about democratizing comfort + style for shoes and empowering women through great design.

To Apply: Please visit https://job-boards.greenhouse.io/margaux/jobs/4182081008

@margauxny
